text:
Sunwing makes family travel planning easy with new Kidcations magazine Published on : Friday, September 25, 2015
Good news for parents looking for ideas on how to arrange the perfect getaway for themselves and their little ones; Sunwing’s new Kidcations magazine ensures family trip planning is as easy as 1, 2, 3.
Sunwing believes that a family vacation only becomes a ‘kidcation’ if it meets the approval of their most demanding customers – the children. So this winter, the tour operator is introducing the new Kidcations magazine to help and inspire families when they are planning their next trip away.
Within its pages, Moms, Dads, grandparents and kids looking for their perfect holiday together will only find resorts that meet all the tour operator’s criteria for a truly memorable family vacation, from varied accommodation options and menus for tots to pristine beachfronts and supervised children’s activities. Also included are recommendations on excursions and attractions designed with younger ones in mind; plus travelling tips, advice on the best kids clubs and activities, together with reviews of the latest gear and gadgets to ensure family travel is a breeze.
However choosing the next kidcation isn’t just a decision for the grown-ups to make. This summer, the tour operator has conducted a national search for some junior kidcation reviewers – or more simply, ‘kidcationers’. Over the next few months, the handpicked group of children and teenagers will be touring some of Sunwing’s most popular Family Collection™ resorts and sharing their impressions first hand, which will be published in the magazine’s next edition in early 2016.
The first edition of Sunwing’s Kidcations magazine is now available for download at Sunwing.ca, and can also be obtained at travel agencies across the country. A copy will also be inserted in the December edition of the popular family magazine, Today’s Parent.
Source:- Sunwing Airlines
